channel.title: dhcpd on Turing Machines Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in dhcpd on Turing Machines Documentation

item.title: Setting up DHCPD on Turing Master
item.description: This tutorial how to setup DHCPD and NAT so that the slave PI can access the internet through the NAT (ETH0->WLAN0) running on Turing Master. This tutorial also describe how to setup the DHCPD to automatically allocated IPs to PI or PCs.
